title: Boku no Hero Academia: Sukue! Kyuujo Kunren!
synopsis: UA High School must regain the public's confidence after the surprise villain attack during class 1-A's training session. Although some of the teachers were gravely injured in the attack, Izuku "Deku" Midoriya and his classmates must continue to learn and train, and utilize their quirks in varying environments and circumstances.
characters: ['Midoriya, Izuku', 'Bakugou, Katsuki', 'Uraraka, Ochako', 'Iida, Tenya', 'Todoroki, Shouto', 'All Might', 'Aizawa, Shouta', 'Kirishima, Eijirou', 'Asui, Tsuyu', 'Kaminari, Denki']
